channel.title: Project Abstract | Solo Development
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tDg0m.jpg?1[/img]
I'm gonna keep a simple update list right below this message, it will not be neat, but it's good enough.
Update List [code=text][October 23 2012]
Added teleport tabs (Varrock, Falador, etc.)
Increased Dragon Maces power and moved it to the pest control shop.
Changed some shops around a bit.
Fixed some bugs (dupes, etc.)
Message for this date: Didn't do much on this day, was a tiring day overall with school and such. [/code]
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,570330.msg4132897.html#msg4132897

item.title: Project Abstract | Solo Development
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

I still wanna keep some factors of the original PI the same, yeah I might get flamed for that but it’s a risk I’m going to take. I liked some of the old PI stuff, it just gives it that ‘oldschool’ feel to it.

Question: Colored Money, or colorless? Like older runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Abstract | Solo Development
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Why is this getting flammed because of a small reason. Anyway looks good. I hope you’ll not quit. Just ignore those kind of people…

Read full topic

item.title: Project Abstract | Solo Development
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:8, topic:465012”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=569342.msg4130559#msg4130559 date=1351024859]
How is that selfish? Really, nobody cares. Yet. Take this down, get shit done, then post it up here.
[/quote]

Lorenzo put 1 picture up and made an introduction. And you bitch at me? Get off my dick.[/quote]
Because there is nothing more done, I stated what I was going to do/did, which you didn’t before, all you said you was tired and was going to post later, then don’t make a topic.
case closed /

Read full topic

item.title: Project Abstract | Solo Development
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:5, topic:465012”][quote author=Kodiak link=topic=569342.msg4130509#msg4130509 date=1351021862]

Why the fuck would you post this? If you don’t have any content or even the decency to spend 20 minutes to write a bit about yourself and the project then you shouldn’t be posting at all.

In my opinion if you don’t have the motivation to write about the project then the chances are you won’t finish it.

Did you even read the post? I was tired you fucking moron.

OT: Updating Information
[/quote]
Then just wait to post until you have time and energy, no one cares about you being tired[/quote]

Speak for yourself, someone saying “no one” is so selfish.

Read full topic
